name: Arkyn
description:
ARKYN

Thousands of years ago the Sargon clan conquered all the land and have long ruled over a peaceful kingdom. While the family is powerful, they cannot survive eternally without the magical power of an enchanted winter stone, stolen from the family decades ago by a renegade Viking who is using the stone to maintain power over the snow.

Arkyn is the last eternal king’s son, the lone descendant of the royal family, and is on a quest to reclaim the winter stone and thaw the frozen lands. He must locate and secure the stone from the heart of a nearby mountain where skeleton mercenaries mining the stone lie in wait to keep him from the eternal flame. He might be outnumbered but he is determined – his fate will be decided in a contest of single combat.

Join Arkyn on his mission and return the winter stone to the Sargon kingdom.
